      Methods in bork that return Room 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) Room GameState.getAdventurersCurrentRoom()
      Returns the Room object that the player is currently in
      Room NPC.getCurrentRoom()
      Gets the Room this NPC is currently in.
      (package private) Room Exit.getDest()
      Getter for the destination Room of the exit.
      Room Dungeon.getEntry()
      Getter for entry room.
      Room Dungeon.getRoom(java.lang.String roomTitle)
      Finds a room in the hashtable by name.
      (package private) Room Exit.getSrc()
      Getter for the source Room of the exit.
      Room Room.leaveBy(java.lang.String dir)
      Gets the Room that the Player reaches when they travel through the Exit in the given direction, if there is an exit there.
      Methods in bork with parameters of type Room 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Dungeon.add(Room room)
      Adds a room to the Dungeon's hashtable.
      (package private) void GameState.setAdventurersCurrentRoom(Room room)
      Sets the adventurers current room to the one read in from the input parameter
      Constructors in bork with parameters of type Room 
      Constructor and Description
      Dungeon(java.lang.String name, Room entry)
      Constructor for Dungeon objects that sets the name and entry room of the Dungeon, initializes the rooms hashtable and filename variable, and calls init().
      Exit(java.lang.String dir, Room src, Room dest)
      Constructor of exit objects that sets the direction, source room, and destination room of the exit, as well as adding the exit to the source room's hashtable.
